title: A new era for fashion: How affluent consumers and luxury brands alike are leading the charge towards a more ... - Luxury Lifestyle Magazine
summary: The luxury fashion industry is undergoing a positive transformation when it comes to sustainability, with both consumers and clothing brands leading the charge. Luxury brands are increasingly adopting ethical sourcing and production processes, circular economy initiatives, and consumer education campaigns to reduce their environmental impact and meet the demands of eco-conscious consumers.

title: Mahindra unveils Global Pik Up concept for international markets - ETAuto
summary: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. showcased its new Global Pik Up concept at its Futurescape event in Cape Town. The Global Pik Up is based on the Tough & Versatile New Gen Ladder Frame platform and promises to be one of the market's most versatile and capable pickups when it goes into production. The Global Pik Up has been designed as a versatile, robust, and stylish vehicle, suitable for a wide range of applications.

title: Retail India News: Panasonic Unveils Penta Decor Star BLDC Motor Fan - Indian Retailer
